ygData.subject: Re: 10 slot back packs
ygData.msgSnippet: I think I saw the backpack pattern in the Halas tunnel. Did not note the price. Chris aka Thunderheart Level 29 Wood-Elf Druid Innoruuk server ... From: Avron
ygData.messageBody:
I think I saw the backpack pattern in the Halas tunnel. Did not note the
price.


Chris aka Thunderheart
Level 29
Wood-Elf
Druid
Innoruuk server
---=== Divine Wind ===---



-----Original Message-----
From: Avron [mailto:avron@...]
Sent: Tuesday, July 06, 1999 7:30 PM
To: EverQuest@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [EverQuest] 10 slot back packs




"Whitmore, Lance" wrote:


I'm pretty sure that most towns have the backpack pattern. Where ever you
find a merchant with a sewing kit.. normally its there right next to the
arrow quiver pattern. I believe it will cost 1p to 2p per pattern.

Actually no, the backpattern is NOT availible in regular tailor shops.. The
only places I know it exist in are Kelethin, West Karana and Highpass..

- Avron -
